law.catch_line: If a person is required to provide an income tax withholding statement under § 10-911 of this artic...
law.text:
If a person is required to provide an income tax withholding statement under § 10-911 of this article, the Comptroller shall assess a penalty of $50 for each violation, if the person willfully:
fails to provide a required withholding statement; or
provides a false withholding statement.
